price: Kandi ibimenyetso bibimburira urupfu bigaragaza ukuri bizaza nta kabuza.. (Maze abwirwe ati) “Ibyo ni byo wajyaga wihunza”.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
